title: Sply Chain Mod:Logistics
description: Course focuses on engineering design concepts and optimization models for logistics decision making in three modules: supply chain design, planning and execution, and transportation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 3133 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
